item.title: [459] Basilius - The revolution
item.dc:creator: @Daladubz Daladubz
item.description:
@Daladubz wrote:

Native^:

^iServer’s.

Never took credit for it? Said I was writing more magic plugins…

Finished gemcutting:

[code]package org.basilius.rs2.model.skills;

import org.basilius.rs2.model.Animation;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Item;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Player;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Skills;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.World;
import org.basilius.rs2.tickable.Tickable;

/**
*

  • Handles all GemCutting
  • @version 1.0
  • @author Daladubz

*/

public class GemCutting {

/**
 * 
 * Handles gem cutting..
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @param useItem
 * 
 * @param useWithItem
 * 
 * @param slot
 * 
 * @param useSlot
 * 
 * @return 
 * 
 */
public static boolean gemCuts(Player player, Item useItem, Item useWithItem, int slot, int useSlot) {
    int item = useItem.getId();
    int usedItem = useWithItem.getId();
    for (int[] data : GEM) 
    {
        int unCut = data[0];
        int cut = data[1];
        int exp = data[2];
        int levelReq = data[3];
        if (item == unCut && usedItem == 1755 || item == 1755 && usedItem == unCut) 
        {
            if(player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CRAFTING) < levelReq) 
            {
                player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a crafting level of " + levelReq + " in order to cut this gem.");
                return false;
            }
            cutGem(player, unCut, cut, exp);
            return true;
        }
    }
    return false;
}

/**
 * 
 * Method used to cut gems..
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @param uncut
 * 
 * @param cut
 * 
 * @param exp 
 * 
 */     
public static void cutGem(final Player player, int unCut, final int cut, final int exp) {
    final Item item = new Item(unCut, 1);
    final Item itemName = new Item(cut, 1);
    player.playAnimation(Animation.create(885));
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cut the " + itemName.getDefinition().getName().toLowerCase() + ".");
    World.getWorld().submit(new Tickable(1) 
    { 
        @Override
        public void execute() 
        {
            player.getInventory().remove(item);
            player.getInventory().add(new Item(cut));
            player.getSkills().addExperience(12, exp);
            this.stop();
        }
    });       
}

/**
 * 
 * uncut, cut, exp, required level
 * 
 */
private static final int[][] GEM = {
    {1623, 1607, 50, 20}, //sapphire
    {1621, 1605, 67, 27}, //emerald
    {1619, 1603, 85, 34}, //ruby
    {1617, 1601, 107, 43}, //diamond
    {1631, 1615, 137, 55}, //dragonstone
    {6571, 6573, 167, 67} //onyx   
};

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [459] Basilius - The revolution
item.dc:creator: @Daladubz Daladubz
item.description:
@Daladubz wrote:

[size=12pt]Updates:[/size]

[ul][li]Magic System plugins[list] [li]Strikes[/li] [li]Bolts[/li] [li]Blasts[/li] [li]Wave[/li] [/list][/li][/ul]

Heres an example of the plugins:

[code]package org.basilius.rs2.model.combat.magic.spells.strikeplugin;

import org.basilius.rs2.model.Entity;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Graphic;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Item;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.Projectile;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.combat.magic.ProjectileBasedSpell;
import org.basilius.rs2.model.combat.magic.data.SpellType;

/**
*

  • Basic WindStrike plugin
  • @version 1.0

*/

public class WindStrike extends ProjectileBasedSpell {

public WindStrike() {
    super(SpellType.STRIKE, Graphic.create(90, 0, 100), Projectile.create(null, null, 91, 0, 50, 0, 43, 35, null, 15, 48), Graphic.create(92, 0, 100), new Item[]{new Item(556), new Item(558)}, 1, 5.5, 2);
}

@Override
public void applySpecialEffects(Entity entity) {
    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported yet.");
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
